# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes the directory share with an empty set of directories.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init()
```

## Creating a directory share

- **init(directories:)**: Creates the directory share with a set of directories on the host.

items.description: Creates the directory share with a set of directories on the host.
items.name: init(directories:)
